newsitem.title: UK: ATHLETICS-PINTO WINS MEN'S LONDON MARATHON.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-PINTO WINS MEN'S LONDON MARATHON.

text.p: Antonio Pinto of Portugal won the men's London marathon on Sunday in an unofficial time of 2 hours 07 minutes and 55 seconds.
Italian Stefano Baldini came second and Josia Thugwane of South Africa finished third.
